definitions.text: a round fastener sewn to shirts and coats etc to fit through buttonholes
an electrical switch operated by pressing
examples: the elevator was operated by push buttons
the push beside the bed operated a buzzer at the desk

definitions.text: any of various plant parts that resemble buttons
a round flat badge displaying information and suitable for pinning onto a garment
examples: they passed out campaign buttons for their candidate

definitions.text: a female sexual organ homologous to the penis
a device that when pressed will release part of a mechanism
any artifact that resembles a button
